desc.cn: l'oGGo（Log & Go）是一款功能丰富的终端用户界面（TUI）应用，由 Golang 编写，利用终端的强大功能来解析基于 JSON 的日志流。
desc.en: l'oGGo or Log & Go is a rich Terminal User Interface app written in golang that harness the power of your terminal to digest log streams based on JSON based logs.

linux/brew.cmd: brew tap aurc/loggo && brew install aurc/loggo/loggo

darwin/brew.cmd: brew tap aurc/loggo && brew install aurc/loggo/loggo
